text: inna alladhina amanu wahajaru wajahadu bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim fi sabili l-lahi wa-alladhina awaw wanasaru ulaika baʿduhum awliyau baʿdin wa-alladhina amanu walam yuhajiru ma lakum min walayatihim min shayin hatta yuhajiru wa-ini is'tansarukum fi l-dini faʿalaykumu l-nasru illa ʿala qawmin baynakum wabaynahum mithaqun wal-lahu bima taʿmaluna basirun
